game.name: Piggy Roll
game.description:
Hey girls! This time you have met with a cute piggy character that loves to be fell down right into the candy box! Your task in this brand new arcade game is to guide it to feel into the candy box and make your win. Does it sound pretty exciting and challenging? Join Piggy Roll game and get ready to solve all 15 puzzles as fast as you can! Your successful will depend upon how timely you change its body into a circle or square. 

You can change the shape of this cute pig by tapping the screen in this html5 platform game. Try to keep your character away from the deadly spikes otherwise you would lose the game immediately! This box is fully of highly delicious candies. The character of the game loves eating candies so your job is to guide it roll right into that basket. Be quick to change its shape from a square to a round circle to clear all puzzle based levels! Shift your character by taping or clicking on the pig!

Grab all the candies and help your pig smile like never before in this fun skill physics game! Many dangerous hurdles are waiting for you. But, you have to play like a true lover of arcade fun challenge to pass all levels. Good luck to have a blast in our all platformer games for kids that are free to play online, no download required! You can create an account on our website without paying anything else. This would help you to create your own profile and track all your achievements and records for free.
